objects.text:
• Lights and Sounds
• Opening Doors
• Diecast Metal Design
• Ages 3 and Up

product_details.name: Truck Toy Model: 1/24 Diecast Metal Toy Trucks with Lights and Sounds, Mini Vehicles Toys for Boys, Ages 3 and Up (Green)
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 5 x 9 x 4 inches. Item Weight: 1.12 pounds. Country of Origin: China. Manufacturer recommended age: 3 years and up.

banner_details:
This banner layout presents a sleek, futuristic design for a toy product. The background uses a grid-like pattern with alternating squares and subtle graph lines, lending a technical, cyber-inspired atmosphere. A 3D product image of a scale model vehicle dominates the top right section. The top-left features prominent, stylized headline text ("heading") in a bold, digital typeface, while a subtler tagline just below ("subheading") complements it with a modern sans-serif font. Mid-left includes a bulleted feature list ("description"), and the bottom-left section displays a bold price ("price") and a call-to-action button labeled "BUY NOW" ("cta"). Geometric accents and circles give a dynamic, layered effect.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Forest Green: `#1D3A34`
- Muted Teal: `#2D4A44`
- Soft Mint/Aqua: `#A0E4D5`
- Bright Teal Blue: `#7FBFB0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and futuristic vehicle rendered in a soft mint green (#A5D5C2), which dominates the body and provides a fresh, modern appeal. The matte black (#1E1E1E) accents on the tires, window frames, and bumpers add a sharp contrast, enhancing the angular design. The windows showcase a gradient smoky gray (#D1D2D3 to #7C7D7E), seamlessly blending into the black rooftop for added dimension. Bright white headlights (#FFFFFF) are strategically used to highlight the car's front, drawing attention. This color palette—mint green, matte black, smoky gray, and brilliant white—creates a bold yet sophisticated visual ideal for an advertisement banner.
